Review Text: Very nice and CLEAN product, which is very important to me. At first I thought it would be a very light gel, but I was actually surprised at the richness of it. Even though it is rich, it doesn't feel heavy or goopy on the face. The smell is pleasant and very light. Cucumbers?

=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Mukti Organics - Organic/Vegan Deep Cleanse Antioxidant Masque (3.5 fl oz / 100 g)
Review Date: 2016/06/01
Store: Mukti Organics
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Mukti Organics', 'Scent': 'Antioxidant', 'Special Feature': 'Organic', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.3 x 3 x 2.2 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'UPC': '741755269525'}
Review Text: What a unique and effective masque! When I first opened the jar I saw that it was a clay based masque and I thought DRYING. However, this is NOT THE CASE AT ALL! The masque is carefully formulated to be both cleansing and exfoliating, but also moisturizing. I felt slight warming and tingling while the masque was on, but it was not irritating at all. The masque contains very small beads made of jojoba that soften on your skin while you have the masque on. When you wash the masque off with warm water, rub the beads in for extra moisture. I really like this product and my skin looks and feels great after use.
Review Title: Cleansing, Exfoliating and Moisturizing AT THE SAME TIME.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Genuine Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Organic and Natural Products**: Strong preference for organic and natural items across skincare and haircare.
- **Positive Ratings**: Frequent high ratings (4-5 stars) indicate satisfaction with quality and performance.
- **Specific Ingredients**: Favorable mentions of scents like rosehip, aloe, and a desire for clean formulations suggest a preference for natural fragrances.
- **Target Needs**: Products aimed at addressing skin concerns (e.g., puffiness, hydration, cleansing, and moisturizing) are consistently chosen.
- **Texture Preferences**: Appears to favor products that combine light and rich formulations, often seeking non-greasy products that effectively nourish without heaviness.
- **Haircare Focus**: Interest in styling and conditioning products tailored for curly, dry hair, emphasizing moisture.
- **Diverse Application**: Purchases for both face and hair indicate a thorough skincare regimen.
- **Brand Loyalty**: Notable inclination towards specific brands, particularly those with organic claims, suggesting a commitment to brand values. 

Overall, the individual favors effective, high-quality organic products that meet specific skincare and haircare needs, with strong brand loyalty and positive engagement with their purchases.

target_interaction.title: I really love all of the Mukti products that I try
target_interaction.text: I really love all of the Mukti products that I try, and this is no exception. Great scrub that definitely overturns skin cells, but not too harsh. Very nice!
target_interaction.title_meta: Mukti Organics - Organic / Vegan 2-IN-1 Resurfacing Exfoliant (3.5 fl oz / 100 ml)
